channel.title: [508] Help
channel.description:
Hi, I need help with a few things please.
1. How to make the drops where they are only visible to the person who does the most damage. 2. How to make the duel area work. You can only use magic in it. 3. How to make It less laggy (Davidscape) 4. How to fix the doors to where they actually open..
If you can help me with these and actually get them working, I can pay you on paypal. Add me on msn to talk, kiddryan7@live.com
Thanks
